Text: can't play this one in VLC, anyone else having the same problem?
7.9gig .iso file...anyone know how to utilize this?  Tried mounting iso image, no joy.  Recommendations?

iso file won't open in magic iso, but can be accessed through daemon tools (lite).
MPC does not play video however, will try on XBMC and see if any joy.

Can anyone confirm whether this is a dud or ok? Much appreciated.
i can confirm you can get the m2ts files out of the ISO file if you mount the MDS file in daemon tools (lite). haven't tried playing the m2ts files yet.
i can confirm the m2ts files work as well.
